languages.text: "Простите за внезапное прошение об аудиенции, Вольный Торговец. {name}. Нам следует, наконец, обсудить дальнейшую судьбу наших отно... нашего сотрудничества".

traits.locale_text: "Простите за внезапное прошение об аудиенции, Вольный Торговец. {name}. Нам следует, наконец, обсудить дальнейшую судьбу наших отно... нашего сотрудничества".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."
languages.original_text: "Простите за внезапное прошение об аудиенции, Вольный Торговец. {name}. Нам следует, наконец, обсудить дальнейшую судьбу наших отно... нашего сотрудничества".

traits.locale_text: "I apologize for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela... our cooperation."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我很抱歉突然请求觐见，行商浪人。{name}，我们需要讨论我们之间的关——我们之间合作的未来。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉突然请求觐见，行商浪人。{name}，我们需要讨论我们之间的关——我们之间合作的未来。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Lamento la repentina solicitud de audiencia, Comerciante Independiente. {name}. Tenemos que hablar del futuro de nuestra rela... cooperación».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento la repentina solicitud de audiencia, Comerciante Independiente. {name}. Tenemos que hablar del futuro de nuestra rela... cooperación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「突然の面会要請、お詫びいたします、自由開拓者。{name}様。今後のあたくし達のかんけ…協力について、話し合う必要があります」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: 「突然の面会要請、お詫びいたします、自由開拓者。{name}様。今後のあたくし達のかんけ…協力について、話し合う必要があります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich möchte mich für das plötzliche Ersuchen um eine Audienz entschuldigen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. {name}. Wir müssen über die Zukunft unserer Bez... unserer Zusammenarbeit sprechen."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte mich für das plötzliche Ersuchen um eine Audienz entschuldigen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. {name}. Wir müssen über die Zukunft unserer Bez... unserer Zusammenarbeit sprechen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Veuillez excuser la soudaineté de ma demande d'audience, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. {name}. Nous devons discuter de l'avenir de notre rela... de notre coopération. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez excuser la soudaineté de ma demande d'audience, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. {name}. Nous devons discuter de l'avenir de notre rela... de notre coopération. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ani görüşme talebinde bulunduğum için özür dilerim Hür Tacir. {name}. İliş... Ortaklığımızın geleceğiyle ilgili konuşmamız gerek."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the sudden request for an audience, Rogue Trader. {name}. We need to discuss the future of our rela— our cooperation."

traits.locale_text: "Ani görüşme talebim için özür diliyorum Hür Tacir. {name}. İliş... Partnerliğimizin geleceği hakkında konuşmamız gerek."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
